comments:
1. Fix/verify segmentation: your nucleus/cell ratios near ~1 suggest the cell mask may collapse to nucleus in many cells; show mask overlays + boundary QC metrics.

2. Use correct statistical unit: analyze per-well (and/or mixed models with plate/well random effects), not pooled single-cell t-tests.

3. Orthogonal validation: γH2AX/53BP1 for DNA damage; TMRM/JC-1 + MitoTracker Green for mito function vs mass; apoptosis/cell-cycle markers to explain density drop.

4. Disentangle mechanism: TIMP3 effects can route via ADAM17/TNFR as well as ECM/integrins; design perturbation/rescue to separate them.

Generalize beyond U2OS: test at least one ECM-relevant line and ideally RPE (SFD/AMD relevance).

5. Tone down claims: replace “direct/bidirectional/first” with “consistent with / suggests” until the above validations land.
